articles.content:

articles.title: Biden disputes Saudi account of Khashoggi murder discussion
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden on Saturday differed with Saudi Arabia in their account of discussions at a bilateral summit about the 2018 murder of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi, a major point of contention between the two countries.
